### Per Year


```{r}
df %>% 
  filter(Year > 2018, Sex == "b", CountryCode == "CHE") %>% 
  mutate(Year = factor(Year)) %>% 
  group_by(Year, CountryCode) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Week, y = DTotal, color = Year)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title="Mortality in Switzerland",
    x="Week of the Year",
    y="Number of Deaths")
```
